0.t:
hold RB and move the Left 
 Joystick to control your right arm. 
 Grab a nearby handhold by releasing RB

1.t: Great! Now do the same with your right leg (RT)

2.t: hold RB and move the Left Joystick to control your right arm

3.t: hold RB and move the Left Joystick to control your right arm

4.t: hold RB and move the Left Joystick to control your right arm

5.t: hold RB and move the Left Joystick to control your right arm

6.t: hold RB and move the Left Joystick to control your right arm

7.t: hold RB and move the Left Joystick to control your right arm

8.t:
hold RB and move the Left 
 Joystick to control your right arm. 
 Grab a nearby handhold by releasing RB

9.t: Great! Now do the same with your right leg (RT)

10.t:
Great! Now do the same 
 with your left leg (LT)

11.t:
Now left arm (LB)! 
 You may need to move your 
 body with the right joystick.

13.t:
Now right arm (RB)! 
 You may need to move your 
 body with the right joystick.

14.t:
Reach! 
 Remember to use your body!

17.t:
Keep going! 
 If you need help, press X!

18.t:
Two extremities can be 
 on the same handhold!

19.t:
You’ve got a great body.
 Remember to use it!

22.t:
The training wheels 
 will come off soon!

24.t:
I used to rock climb,
 but I was a lot boulder back then.
